name: Desert Car Rally Stunts
description:
Desert Car Rally Stunts!!!
Be a skilled driver in desert dunes and clear different challenges within time to unlock next level. Every next level is more interesting than previous one. But be careful on sand dunes, as high speed may cause rolling down of your vehicle, so control on it is also important factor for best drive.
Features:
• Absolutely free to play
• Limited time to clear your level
• 3D beautiful environment
• Offline play
• Stunning graphics
• Cool visual and sound effects
